title: 7 Attributes Of A Good Leader
dc:creator: Tracy Brinkmann | Personal Development in the spirit of Tony Robbins, Napoleon Hill, & Zig Ziglar
description:
Leadership is a daunting task, and there are many theories about how to best lead others. But regardless of the theory employed, there are attributes that great leaders share. With the right blend of attributes, you can thrive within any leadership system. Better yet it is Â possible to develop these characteristics with study and effort.
